title: Welcome to el Magnet at 1141 N Front Street!
description:
Welcome to el Magnet at 1141 N Front Street! This building is designed with modern touches and warm finishes. It features great amenities including a shared common roof deck with center city views, a bike room, elevator, and parking. The apartment features vinyl flooring throughout the unit with large windows for natural lighting. The kitchen is complemented with a quartz countertop and a beautiful backsplash that blends in perfectly with the white cabinets and makes the kitchen look very modern and clean. There is plenty of cabinet space and all the appliances you can ask for inside a unit including a microwave and an in-unit washer and dryer. With an awareness of the vibrant, surrounding neighborhood, the builder took great care to provide high-quality sound reducing windows and walls to provide a relaxing home environment. The building offers limited parking spots at an additional cost. About Fishtown and Northern Liberties: Located in the heart of Fishtown, just a half block off of Girard Ave and two blocks from Frankford Ave. 1141 N Front is walking distance of the best dining and entertainment around: The Fillmore, Fette Sau, Frankford Hall, Johnny Brenda's, Mulherin's, Sugarhouse, the Piazza at Schmidt's, and much more. Steps to public transit options - the Market-Frankford Line, the Girard trolley, and SEPTA buses as well as quick access to I-95 and Columbus Ave.

description:
﻿
Rent: $3299/month

KEY FEATURES
Property: 154 Golf Club Dr Langhorne PA 19047
Square Footage: 2,000 sq/ft (including basement)
Bedrooms: 3 Beds
Bathrooms: 2.5 Baths

Vinyl flooring through the whole house

Pets Policy: Pets Allowed (with deposit)
Laundry: In Unit
Property Type: Town-home in a Windy Bush Development
DESCRIPTION:
Welcome to this impeccably upgraded and fully remodeled end townhome, ideally situated in the sought-after Windy Bush community of Langhorne. Step inside this remarkable residence and be greeted by a luminous and contemporary open concept design on the first floor. The centerpiece of this space is the custom white kitchen, boasting exquisite quartz countertops that effortlessly complement the sleek cabinetry and top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances. With its generous size, a spacious island, and ample storage, this kitchen is a culinary enthusiast's dream. Flowing seamlessly from the kitchen, the dining area and cozy living room create an inviting atmosphere, enhanced by the presence of a charming wood-burning fireplace.
In addition to these exceptional features, the first floor encompasses a convenient half bath, sliders that lead to a private fenced patio, and a versatile front room that can be utilized as a formal dining room or a well-appointed in-home office—a perfect match for the needs of today's discerning buyers.
Venturing upstairs, you will discover a generously proportioned primary bedroom that offers a haven of tranquility. This retreat is complete with an en-suite bathroom that showcases custom modern finishes and a luxurious walk-in steam shower, providing the utmost relaxation and privacy. Additionally, two additional well-appointed bedrooms and a full bathroom can be found on the upper level, all featuring ample closet space to accommodate your storage needs.
Completing this exceptional property, an additional storage room on the second floor and a one-car garage offer added convenience and utility. The homeowners' association takes care of lawn care, snow removal, and landscaping, allowing you to fully enjoy the comforts of this remarkable home.
Don't miss out on the opportunity to make this remarkable townhome your own and experience the epitome of modern, elegant living in the highly desirable Windy Bush community.
LEASE TERMS:
First month, Last month, one month security deposit due at lease signing. $50 application fee per applicant. Tenants responsible for all utilities: water, electricity, cable/internet.

This building is perfectly situated close to all the best spots in Philly, major universities, highways & whatever you can imagine. 2010 Walnut St was built in 1860 and was originally owned by the Wilkinson Sword Blade family. In recent decades, Eberhardt's Antiques operated out of the first floor. Now it is your chance to rent this amazing, affordable 1-bed apartment in the heart of Rittenhouse Square! When you walk into the building, you will be amazed by the preserved historic details and gorgeous mirrors throughout the hallway. The building has a big shared rooftop with sublime views of the city! The apartment is located on the basement level of the building and has a small outdoor space! The details of the building will make every day walking in that hallway feel like a special occasion! The apartment can fit easily all of your furniture and you can comfortably host all of your friends and family. The bedroom has a spacious closet with an organizer, and space for a full/queen bed, desk, dresser, and more. It has stainless steel appliances, a dishwasher, central AC & Heating, a beautiful bathroom, and an in-unit washer & dryer! The only con is that there is not much natural light. It will be professionally cleaned before the new tenant's move-in date. Water is included in the rent. Pets are ok with a pet deposit and under 50 pounds. Inquire about the video tour! First, and last & security to move in. 700+ credit score & 3x the rent income required to move in. No Airbnb arbitrage. Inquire about other units that we have available in this beautiful building!
2010 Walnut St #B01

title: Enjoy the convenience of luxury of Center City living!
description:
Enjoy the convenience of luxury of Center City living in this 1-Bedroom 1-Bathroom on the 18th floor of The Ellington! This spacious home offers wonderful light and city views from the oversized windows, an abundance of storage throughout the home, and an in-unit washer and dryer. You enter the home through a foyer with a hanging closet that leads you to the generous living/dining room. The kitchen is outfitted with granite counters, stainless steel appliances, and an abundance of cabinet and counter space. The large bedroom offers a deep double closet and even more incredible city views. The bathroom is off the bedroom and offers a linen closet, tile floors, and a combination shower/tub. 1-year lease is required. Tenant is responsible for electricity and internet/cable TV. Tenant can have cats. Fees include a $300 move-in fee and $200 lease fee to the Ellington. The Ellington is a high-rise on the 1500 block of Chestnut St. The building offers a 24-hour door person and fitness center. All homes are wired for either Comcast or Verizon FiOS High-Speed Internet and Cable. Residents can have up to 2 pets that are under 40 lbs. Located in the heart of Center City, you’re close to everything you need: fabulous dining options such as Butcher & Singer, Marathon Grill, The Oyster House, Harp & Crown, Guiseppe's and Sons, and Elixr Coffee Roasters, only one block away from the incredible shopping Walnut St has to offer. Getting around the city couldn’t be easier as you are steps from a plethora of bus lines, the Broad Street Line subway, and Suburban Station. Please note- these photos are from a previous listing, the window treatments have been replaced with wooden blinds.
1500 Chestnut St #18I

title: You’ll never want to leave your neighborhood!
description:
This unit features an extra room which can be used as an office or an additional bedroom Welcome to your new home, 735 Spruce Street, located in the heart of Philadelphia’s charming and historic Washington Square West neighborhood. This apartment features tall ceilings, a spacious floor plan, plenty of storage space, and oversized windows. Washington Square houses a large collection of historic 18th and 19th-century residential architecture that offers you a glimpse into Philadelphia’s past. A charming district filled with cobblestone streets and brick structures, you will never tire of the wide array of dining, shopping, sightseeing, and museums. Local attractions include Washington Square Park (5-min walk) and Penn’s Landing (along the waterfront), while historic attractions include the Liberty Bell and Independence Hall. Whole Foods Market, ACME, and one of the most well-known restaurants in Philadelphia, Zahav, are all within walking distance of the Properties. With so many local amenities you’ll never want to leave your neighborhood! 735 Spruce is also immediately catty-corner to Pennsylvania Hospital, offering nurses, residents, doctors, and employees of the nearby institution immediate access to housing.
735 Spruce St #4F

title: Beautiful South Philly Home for Rent
description:
This exceptional residence in South Philadelphia is a rare discovery that will make a lasting impact! Situated on a delightful and secure street with friendly neighbors, this charming two-bedroom, one-and-a-half-bathroom home offers a multitude of desirable features.
For your peace of mind, the front door is equipped with a new Schlage lock, and the property also includes a transferable Ring Floodlight camera. Additionally, a new mailbox with a lock and key is provided.
Inside the house, the first floor showcases a cozy living room, a dining area with a beautifully crafted reclaimed wood wall, a convenient half bathroom, and a well-appointed kitchen. Relax in the living room, where a generously sized wall-mounted TV and an electric fireplace create a soothing ambiance. The kitchen is equipped with a double-basin stainless steel sink featuring a new Moen faucet and garbage disposal, a gas stove, a dishwasher, and a newer refrigerator with a filtered water and ice maker. Stay cool while cooking with the ceiling fan overhead!
Step outside from the kitchen and discover a spacious patio adorned with custom artwork created by the owner and a renowned mural artist from Philadelphia. Enhancing the atmosphere, a propane fire pit and a brand new motion-sensor floodlight complete the outdoor space.
The expansive finished basement includes a laundry room furnished with a new hot water heater and brand new washer and dryer. Upstairs, you'll find a hall bathroom featuring a jacuzzi tub and a separate shower stall, as well as a new Pfister showerhead and sink faucet. The master bedroom is bright and airy, complete with a ceiling fan and ample closet space. The cozy second bedroom is ideal for a nursery or a reading room and also includes a ceiling fan.
Additional highlights of this property include central air conditioning, hardwood floors throughout, and proximity to East Passyunk Ave, the Broad Street Line (Oregon Station), FDR and Marconi parks, the stadium complex, local bars, and restaurants. An outdoor parking lot within walking distance is available for a monthly fee.
Tenants are responsible for all utilities, while the owner covers quarterly pest maintenance provided by Green Pest Solutions. Dogs may be considered on a case-by-case basis with additional fees. The property will be professionally cleaned prior to the tenant's move-in.
To proceed with your application, we will conduct credit checks, verify criminal records, examine eviction history, and thoroughly review all income and financial documents. If selected as a tenant, a security deposit equal to one month's rent, as well as the first and last month's rent, will be collected. We do not have specific minimum credit score requirements. Your complete financial and credit profile will be comprehensively assessed to determine the suitability of your application. We are excited about the opportunity to work with you and assure you that the process will be conducted in a smooth, efficient, and professional manner. We appreciate your interest in this home and wish you the best of luck in finding your new residence.

title: Apartments near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history!
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on the National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment near Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors. Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & Boxing . Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media Room . Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. On-Site Green Drop Donation Box. ** Pricing and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **

title: Charming 1-Bedroom Residence with a Spacious Rear Deck!
description:
Charming 1-Bedroom Residence with a Spacious Rear Deck in Philadelphia's Graduate Hospital Neighborhood. Welcome to your new home nestled in the vibrant and sought-after Graduate Hospital neighborhood of Philadelphia. This delightful 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom residence offers a comfortable and stylish living space, complete with modern amenities and convenient features. With its prime location, hardwood floors, central air conditioning, in-unit washer/dryer, and ample storage space in the basement, this rental property presents an excellent opportunity for a comfortable and enjoyable urban lifestyle. Upon entering, you'll be greeted by the warm ambiance of the hardwood floors that run throughout the entire residence, lending an elegant touch to the space. The residence boasts a generous sized bedroom, each offering a peaceful sanctuary for rest and rejuvenation. The bedroom is thoughtfully designed with ample closet space, allowing you to keep your belongings neatly organized and easily accessible. The bathroom is tastefully designed and equipped with modern fixtures, ensuring comfort and convenience for all residents. One of the highlights of this remarkable property is the rear deck, providing the perfect outdoor oasis for relaxation and entertainment. Whether you're sipping your morning coffee, enjoying an al fresco meal, or soaking up the sun, this private deck is an ideal space to unwind and appreciate the beautiful weather. It offers ample room for outdoor furniture and potted plants, allowing you to personalize the space according to your preferences. Additional features of this residence include central air conditioning to keep you comfortable during hot summer days, laundry facilities conveniently located in the basement, and extra storage space for your seasonal items and belongings. Located in the highly desirable Graduate Hospital neighborhood, this residence offers the best of urban living. You'll be within close proximity to an array of restaurants, cafes, boutiques, and grocery stores. Enjoy a leisurely stroll or bike ride to the nearby Schuylkill River Trail, Rittenhouse Square, or the eclectic South Street district. The neighborhood also provides easy access to public transportation, making commuting to other parts of the city a breeze. Don't miss out on the opportunity to call this stunning Graduate Hospital residence your new home. Contact us today to schedule a showing and experience the charm and convenience of this wonderful rental property firsthand. Monthly Utility fees: Water $35/mth 1 person, $50/mth 2 people. Common area electric $15/mth

title: Sunny 1 bedroom condo WITH POOL and courtyard available now in the rar
description: Sunny 1 bedroom condo WITH POOL and courtyard available now in the rarely offered Strickland court condominiums located in the heart of Washington square west. Upon entry you will admire the old Philadelphia charm and history of this converted brownstone that retains many of its original details. Entering the unit you will be impressed by the open floor plan, high ceilings, and giant windows that soak this space in tons of natural light. This space opens up to a large kitchen with a large pantry and ample counter space. Moving through the hallway you will find a full bathroom and storage closet that has an in unit washer dryer. The main bedroom contains 2 closets with additional space overhead for extra storage along with large windows overlooking the courtyard. Enjoy the shared courtyard with a pool shared only by Strickland court residents. The location of this house cannot be beat with close access to public transit and Jefferson hospital and steps away from many restaurants such as Middle Child, Kanella, GreenStreet Coffee Roasters, Varga, Tria, Bleu Sushi to name just a few! title: Nicely updated townhome at the highly sought after Highlands Community
description:
WONDERFUL LOCATION! Available for last week of June July 1st. Central Bucks Schools (Blue Ribbon Schools)! Welcome Home to the nicely updated townhome at the highly sought after Highlands Community! Excellent Location close to Chalfont Train Station, Doylestown, Rt 202 Expressway, Rt 309, Rt 463 and the PA Turnpike. Very close to highways, schools, shopping, dining and entertainment! As you enter into foyer, you will find a large coat closet to the left and half bathroom. Living room and formal dining room! Beautiful newly refinished Hardwood flooring throughout first floor and basement! The eat-in kitchen features newer appliances and plenty of cabinet space. The kitchen also has sliding glass doors which lead you out to a large spacious bi-level deck which is great for entertaining. Beautiful views of wooded backyard from the deck! Upstairs you will find the master bedroom highlighted with a separate bathroom access with double vanity and large walk in closet! The other two bedrooms are just down the hall. Conveniently located Second Floor Laundry - New Washer and Dryer included! The home has a 1-car garage and parking in the driveway for two more cars! Large finished Basement with Propane fireplace, Newer roof and HVAC system, recessed lighting and two large storage areas!
To complete your query in one talk let me know your name nd number and a good leisure time to connect.

title: FAIRLY NEW 3-BED, 3-BATH APARTMENT, $2100, NEAR DREXEL AND UPENN, AVAI
description:
Our properties in University City Philadelphia are conveniently located within walking distance to University of Pennsylvania, Drexel University; public transportations, including Drexel-Penn Bus transport; restaurants, coffee shops, grocery stores, shopping, entertainment, parks, and more. Downtown Philadelphia, Museums, and King of Prussia are minutes away by public transport or private car. The properties are newly constructed, affordable, and located in a safe and secure neighborhood. They are within the University City District patrol area, and our tenants can take advantage of walking escorts and other services such as vehicle lock-outs and jumpstarts. The buildings have security cameras and the units have smoke detectors, security alarm, fire alarms, indoor sprinklers, doorbell with camera with intercom, hardwood floors, in-unit washer and dryer, and central AC. We understand our tenants’ needs and so we provide the convenience of the tenant portal system, e-leasing, and subletting/lease transfer for those who cannot stay due to Drexel co-op. Our staff make frequent rounds and we respond to tenant requests within 24-72 hours.
Locations:
3716 Haverford Ave (2 units left, both units are identical)

title: This bi-level 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom
description:
This bi-level, 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom home, just minutes from Graduate Hospital and central to many new and up-and-coming restaurants in Point Breeze, is not to be missed! Enter the space through the shared patio and step into the open floor plan of the kitchen and living room. Being on the corner, the first floor is lined with windows throughout to provide beautiful natural sunlight to illuminate the stainless steel appliances in the kitchen with its updated finishes and granite counter tops. The bedroom is bright, spacious, and has a walk-in closet! The first full bathroom is located off the living room. Continue to the lower level, complete with modern tile throughout, storage, and a washer and dryer. The master bedroom features an in-suite bathroom, tons of space to fit any size bedroom set, and a double closet. The unit also comes with central air and heat. Point Breeze Neighborhood - Conveniently located just south of Graduate Hospital, Point Breeze is easily accessible to Rittenhouse Square, the Schuykill River Park, the Italian Market, and more by foot, bus, or the Broad Street line. Additional neighborhood amenities include ample non-permitted street parking, corner grocers, and local watering holes and eateries, including the American Sardine Bar, Circles Thai take-out and BYOB, the OCF Coffee House, and On Point Bistro.
If you are interested in viewing this property or have any questions, please send me an email or message.

title: House for Rent in Roxborough/Manayunk!
description:
Available 7/15 - 4 bedroom/2 full bath row home available in desirable Roxborough-Manayunk! Rent is $2550 plus utilities (water, gas, electric, and internet paid by tenant). Rent is negotiable. The spacious living and dining rooms include original hardwood floors. The kitchen includes tiled flooring and counters, and newer appliances including a stainless steel fridge and dishwasher.
The hallway off the kitchen leads to a full bathroom and to the back of the house where there is a covered porch (with new roof), and long fenced in backyard which is perfect for hanging out with friends, as well as gardening. There is also a fully covered front porch and front yard.
The 2nd floor includes two bedrooms, one with a bay window with excellent light, and both with hardwood floors. There is also a room with built-in shelves, and an updated hall bathroom featuring a tiled shower, shelving, and new lighting. The 3rd floor includes two additional carpeted bedrooms. There is also a unfinished basement that runs the full length of the house, and includes a workshop area, plenty of room for storage, as well as a new washer and dryer.
This property is located on a wide, two-way street (rare in this neighborhood!), just one block from the shops and restaurants on Ridge Ave, including Starbucks, Primos, Santuccis, Bob's Diner, Acme, and UPS, and bars such as Hilltown Tavern and Twisted Gingers brewery, all withing walking distance. A short drive away is Wawa, Target, and Shop-Rite. Walking down the hill brings you to Main Street Manayunk where there are many restaurants, bars, and shopping. If you enjoy nature, the Wissahickon Valley Park and Manayunk Towpath are within walking distance. There is also the Manayunk bridge which goes across the river to the Bala Cynwyd Heritage Trail.
There is convenient Septa transit nearby, including both the and Regional Rail down the hill and multiple bus routes within one block. This property is also close to many colleges and universities, including Jefferson (Philadelphia University campus in East Falls), St. Joes, PCOM, LaSalle and Chestnut Hill College. Pets are allowed, 2 maximum, both dogs and cats, with one time pet deposit of $250. Additional animals can be reviewed on a case by case basis.
The house is radiator heat, and includes two air conditioner window units. $50 application fee per person, background checks and proof of income required. Co-signers are allowed. Security deposit and first and last month's rent required.
If interested, send me a message!

title: Newly Renovated Single-family home!Pets Friendly! W/D in Unit!
description:
Introducing the immaculate and newly renovated single-family home located at 3629 Earp St, Philadelphia, PA 19146.
The home comes fully equipped with brand new stainless steel appliances: refrigerator, stove/range, microwave, and dishwasher, along with newer, modern cabinets with newer countertops. The kitchen also has a brand new stainless steel gooseneck faucet and garbage disposal. The 1st floor living room and dining room has an open floor plan so that you can freely design how you would like to set up your living room and dining room furnishings. In the dining room, there is a half bathroom for your daily convenience.
The other 1 bedroom is also very nice sized bedrooms that can comfortably fit a queen size mattress that also comes equipped with a closet and ceiling fan as well. There is a newly renovated full bathroom with a jacuzzi, walk-in standing shower, toilet, vanity sink, and vanity mirror along with elegant porcelain tiles throughout the bathroom!
Going into the basement, you have an open recreational space that can also be used to lounge with family/friends or for your everyday storage needs! Further, there is a newer set of washer and dryer conveniently placed in the basement so that you no longer need to go to the laundromat carrying multiple bags of laundry.
This house is conveniently located nearby public transportation, shopping centers, major highways, public/private schools, parks, etc!
Tenant is responsible for all utilities: water, gas, and electric.  Small cats and/or dogs are allowed on a case-by-case basis.

title: Are you looking for a move-in ready home in a quiet neighborhood?
description: Are you looking for a move-in ready home in a quiet neighborhood? Is off-street parking important? An updated kitchen and bath a must have? Get ready to check these all off your list! Welcome home to 208 Roberts Ave, a gorgeous bungalow that is nestled in the Fairoaks neighborhood of Horsham. The location can t be beat! Enjoy the peace and quiet of neighborhood living while being mere minutes from oodles of restaurants, shops, and easy access to major highways. This home is also located in a top rated school district! The beautiful sunroom is the perfect entrance into this lovely house. Enjoy all the natural light year round by setting this room up as a reading area or set up a bistro table and chairs for dining. The main living area has been completely opened up for those who desire an open floorplan. The hardwood floors have been nicely refinished with a darker stain that pops against the neutral walls (newer paint) and white trim. Recessed lights were added and there is plenty of room for the popular sectional sofa. The dining area nicely flows with the living room, making it easy to entertain family and friends. A dining table fits nicely under the modern chandelier and provides views overlooking the side yard. The kitchen is an absolute dream! Newer tile floors, white shaker cabinets, built-in pantry shelving, subway tile backsplash, recessed lighting, granite counters and crown molding complete the look. Stainless steel appliances include electric cook-top range, built-in microwave, dishwasher and fridge. We personally love the glass accent cabinets, ideal for those looking to showcase their favorite dishes. A breakfast bar was added for additional stool seating to enjoy a quick meal or a morning cup of coffee. Bedroom come complete with newer carpeting, ceiling fans and cedar closets. The bathroom was updated with newer floors, a shower/tub combo and a subway tile accent shelf above the sink for toiletries. The large unfinished basements has a ton of potential! A private rear entrance leads to the basement and into the kitchen area. Currently the basement contains the laundry area with utility sink. There is rough-in plumbing for a bathroom to be added to the basement. If desired, the basement could be finished into the ultimate man cave, TV/Media room, you name it! It also provides tons of storage space, which you can never have too much of! Parking isn t an issue with the massive detached two car garage. A separate shed is attached on the one side for additional storage space for lawn equipment or outdoor furniture. Inside the garage are additional rooms for more storage (or for a workshop) and stairs that lead up to the large unfinished loft (could be finished into a play room or a nice, private spot for a home office). Why wait?

title: Sun-soaked corner property in Northern Liberties!
description:
Sun-soaked corner property in Northern Liberties! Within the walls of this gorgeous brick townhome, hardwood flooring, natural light, and generous living spaces await you! The inviting living space welcomes you with built-in shelving, warm wood flooring, crown molding, and amazing natural light. The powder room is located right beside this space for convenience. Down the stairs awaits your spacious eat-in kitchen featuring warm wood shaker cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, multiple windows and room for a dining table. The stackable washer/dryer is also within this space. The 2nd floor is home to a large bedroom and 1 full bath. The upper floor features the primary suite with a skylight, walk-in closet and ensuite bathroom. The natural light and warm wood flooring fill the space with ease. The tiled bathroom closely resembles the other with a stylish vanity and large stall shower. Now let's talk location. Perfectly situated in the desirable neighborhood of Northern Liberties, this home is truly by it all. Hot dining spots like Urban Village Brewing Co., Figo, Jery's Bar and SO many more. title: Spaciousness of true loft living! Welcome home!
description:
Welcome to Lofts 640 in the heart of Philadelphia, PA! Your monthly rent includes extended cable TV service, access to our fitness center, indoor/heated pool and hot tub with an attached outdoor roof deck, yoga/fitness studio, cyber lounge, 24/7 front desk attendant and more! As you enter 640 North Broad, you'll step away from the busy street and into an urban space that artfully blends the old with the new. The original character of the building has been enhanced by modern accents and furnishings, creating a unique and sophisticated environment. Our community is vibrant and welcoming, with state-of-the-art amenities designed to nurture both body and spirit. You'll love relaxing in our glass-domed pool house, where the warm salt water pool and Jacuzzi spa offer the perfect respite from the stresses of daily life. Meet and socialize with fellow residents on our rooftop deck lounge, or take advantage of our cyber cafe and yoga studio to stay connected and centered. Our lobby is a work of art, featuring geometric ceiling lights that illuminate the mocha-colored floors. With stunning white and stainless steel accents, the lobby is the perfect introduction to the energy and excitement of Loft 640. Located just six blocks from City Hall on Broad Street, our community is centrally located to shops, restaurants, hospitals, and the thriving community of Fairmount. Reading Terminal Market and the Pennsylvania Convention Center are just minutes away. Living at Loft 640 is the perfect combination of the commuter convenience of center city living and the spaciousness of true loft living. Welcome home!
640 N Broad Street N Broad Street #725
